JobFullDesc: To give people the power to build community on our platforms, we need to make sure they have the best and most secure experiences possible. People on the BI Business Reporting and Analytics team empower Facebook’s Business Integrity Operations organization to be self-sufficient in tactical decision-making and drive operations strategy through objective analysis. Our key partners are GO Central Analytics, problem owners and teams within BI, and Data Engineering/Data Science on the Product side. We are responsible for providing accurate, reliable and accessible business metrics as well as contextualizing them in operational performance with research and advanced analysis. We are looking for Analysts who share our passion for helping make Facebook a safe place for people and businesses to connect across the world. The right candidate will be comfortable in a fast-moving organization, excited to collaborate and focused on positively impacting the experience of a large scale global workforce and the entire Facebook Community.
